law.catch_line: Unannounced inspection of adult day care centers.
law.text: Agents of the cabinet may enter any certified adult day care center at any time for the purpose of inspection or investigation. All inspections of adult day care centers by the cabinet shall be unannounced.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 422, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
